mapper.insert: insert into employee (name_ko, name_en, phone, email, address) values (#{name_ko}, #{name_en}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address})
mapper.select: select id, name_ko, name_en, phone, email, address, regdate from employee where id=#{id}
select id, name_ko,name_en,phone,email,address,regdate from employee order by id desc
